title: Pixel 5 Poor Battery Life
content:
So, I bought a Pixel 5 on launch day and got in mid October. Within the first few days, I noticed that battery life was dire, I was getting 3 hours screen on time for four days straight. This was a lot less than 7-8 hours reviewers were claiming. I RMAd the device and had the same issue so am fairly certain it's not hardware related. I turned of the 5G and this seemed to help. However, I'm still getting like 4 hours SOT with a max of 5. The phone is also noticeably warm when being used even if it's just web browsing or reading and eBook where it should be stone cold. 

I can't work out what is wrong, it's unlikely to be hardware. Nothing obviously wrong shows up on battery usage. Anyone experienced anything similar with their Pixel 5?
